How to solve a word problem with systems of equations

Q. Priscilla sells stufed animals at a\n0\nlocal craft show. She charges [imath] \$ 13 [/imath] for the small ones and [imath] \$ 12 [/imath] for the large. She sold [imath] \$ 350 [/imath] worht of animals. After the show she nothiced\n19. that she sold 27 stuffed animals. How many were small and how many were large?
